Summary: Air fryer bacon comes out crispy, evenly cooked, and ready in just 10 minutes. It's perfect for busy mornings!
Instructions: Lay 5-6 slices of bacon in the bottom of an air fryer basket in a single layer without overlapping.
Set the air fryer to 360 degrees Fahrenheit and cook the bacon for 8-10 minutes. Check the bacon at 5 minutes and rearrange if needed.  Continue to cook until desired crispiness.
Remove the bacon from the air fryer and place it on a paper towel-lined plate.
Comments: Clara says:Yes, it is true! All I needed was ten minutes to prepare this dish as an appetizer! Crispy, juicy and succulent, everyone in my house loved this meaty treat. I had some bacon left from last night and tried this recipe last night in the evening as a light snack.
